title: Smart Data Models - GenICompensationForGenJ
description: Adapted from CIM data models. This class provides the resistive and reactive components of compensation for the generator associated with the IEEE Type 2 voltage compensator for current flow out of one of the other generators in the interconnection.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GenICompensationForGenJ

SynchronousMachineDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Standard synchronous machine out of which current flow is being compensated for. Default: None

VcompIEEEType2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The standard IEEE Type 2 voltage compensator of this compensation. Default: None
